about_the_game:
Melee Spaceship is a top-down shooter roguelite where you control a spaceship with no guns! Instead, you’ll need to rely on skillful ramming, smashing enemies, and strategically dodging danger as you fight through waves of foes. Earn cash from defeated enemies to unlock powerful upgrades, which let you tailor your ship to your unique playstyle across a variety of builds.

Key Features:

  • Ramming Combat: In Melee Spaceship, your primary weapon is the ship itself. Smash into enemies with precision, timing, and power-ups that modify your ramming abilities. This gives this bullet hell a fighting game feel as combos are encouraged. The more you crash into your foes, the more devastating your attacks become.

  • Diverse Enemies: Face off against a wide variety of enemies, each with unique attack patterns, strengths, and weaknesses. You'll need to learn their behavior to survive—some enemies might be tough to ram directly, while others might swarm you in groups.

  • Dynamic Upgrades: Customize your ship's abilities and attributes with a huge range of upgrades. Whether you prefer to enhance your speed, boost your defenses, or unlock devastating powers that complement your ramming tactics, there are upgrades to suit every playstyle.

  • Progressive Worlds: Navigate through a series of progressively challenging worlds, each filled with unique enemy types and escalating difficulty. Each world culminates in an intense final boss battle that will test your combat skills and upgrade choices.

  • Roguelite Mechanics: Every run is different, thanks to procedurally generated levels and randomized upgrades. Die and restart with new combinations of abilities, ensuring each playthrough feels fresh and rewarding.

  • Strategic Power-ups: In addition to upgrades, you’ll occasionally find healing drops and other powerful one-time boosts to keep you in the fight longer. Learn when to use them wisely as you battle your way through increasingly difficult waves.

  • Replayability: With multiple worlds, upgrades, and build possibilities, Melee Spaceship offers endless replayability. Each run presents new challenges, and mastering the best strategies for survival will keep you coming back for more.
